languages.text: "Ни одной чистой души не предстало предо мной, {name}. Каждый словом, делом или помышлением был повинен перед Императором".
"Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Ни одной чистой души не предстало предо мной, {name}. Каждый словом, делом или помышлением был повинен перед Императором".

traits.locale_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “那些被带到我面前的人，没有一个是无辜的，{name}。无论是他们的行为还是思想，在帝皇面前都是有罪的。”
languages.original_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “那些被带到我面前的人，没有一个是无辜的，{name}。无论是他们的行为还是思想，在帝皇面前都是有罪的。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「{name}、私の前に純粋な魂が現れた事はない。犯した行為であれ意図であれ、皇帝の前では誰もが罪を犯している」
languages.original_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、私の前に純粋な魂が現れた事はない。犯した行為であれ意図であれ、皇帝の前では誰もが罪を犯している」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «No he tenido ante mí ni una sola alma pura, {name}. Todos han sido culpables ante el Emperador ya sea por sus actos o por sus intenciones».
languages.original_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «No he tenido ante mí ni una sola alma pura, {name}. Todos han sido culpables ante el Emperador ya sea por sus actos o por sus intenciones».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Es stand noch nie eine vollständig reine Seele vor mir, {name}. Ob in Tat oder in Absicht, alle waren vor dem Imperator schuldig."
languages.original_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Es stand noch nie eine vollständig reine Seele vor mir, {name}. Ob in Tat oder in Absicht, alle waren vor dem Imperator schuldig."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Aucune âme pure ne s'est présentée devant moi, {name}. Que ce soit par leurs actes ou leurs intentions, tous ceux que j'ai jugés ont été reconnus coupables devant l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Aucune âme pure ne s'est présentée devant moi, {name}. Que ce soit par leurs actes ou leurs intentions, tous ceux que j'ai jugés ont été reconnus coupables devant l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Karşıma bir tane bile saf bir ruh getirilmedi {name}. Eylemleriyle ve niyetleriyle her biri, İmparator'un karşısında suçluydu."
languages.original_text: "Not a single pure soul has been brought before me, {name}. Be it in their deeds or intentions, all have been guilty before the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Karşıma bir tane bile saf bir ruh getirilmedi {name}. Eylemleriyle olsun, niyetleriyle olsun, her biri de İmparator'un karşısında suçluydu."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
